sign_in_to_manage_inventory: Sign in to manage your inventory.
manage_warehouse_items: Manage your warehouse items with ease.
manage_inventory_workers: Manage your inventory and workers from here.
create_edit_delete_tags: Create, edit, and delete tags to organize your items.
confirm_delete_tag: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This will remove it from all associated items.
search_by_name_tag_desc: Search by name, tag, or description...
scan_item_add_remove_description: Scan an item's barcode to add or remove stock.
select_item_from_results: Select an item from the results:
this_is_one_time_use_item: This is a one-time use item.
no_existing_item_found: No existing item found for this barcode. Please add the new item details.
cannot_remove_more_than_available: Cannot remove more items than available in stock. Available: {{available}}
quantity_change_greater_than_zero: Quantity to change must be greater than 0.
item_not_found_add_new: Item not found. You can add it as a new item.
multiple_items_found_select: Multiple items found. Please select one from the list.
no_items_found_for_name: No items found with that name.
this_is_one_time_use_item_takeout_only: This is a one-time use item. It can only be taken out, not restocked.
cannot_restock_one_time_use: Cannot restock a one-time use item.
fill_item_name_quantity: Please fill in at least the item name and quantity.
position_barcode_horizontally: Position the barcode horizontally within the frame.
check_camera_permissions_or_close_apps: Please check camera permissions or close other apps using the camera.
no_camera_found_access_denied: No camera found or access was denied.
no_barcode_scanned_cancelled: No barcode scanned or scan was cancelled.
flashlight_native_only: Flashlight is only available on native devices.
